title: PlayAction
description: The act of playing/exercising/training/performing for enjoyment, leisure, recreation, Competition or exercise.

related.ListenAction: Unlike ListenAction (which is under ConsumeAction), PlayAction refers to performing for an audience or at an event, rather than consuming music.

related.WatchAction: Unlike WatchAction (which is under ConsumeAction), PlayAction refers to showing/displaying for an audience or at an event, rather than consuming visual content.
